Package tron

Class Motorcycle

java.lang.Object
tron.Motorcycle
public class Motorcycle extends Object
The Motorcycle class represents a player's motorcycle in the TRON game. It keeps track of the motorcycle's position, direction, trail, and color. The motorcycle moves on the game board and leaves a trail behind it. This class provides methods for moving the motorcycle, adding to its trail, and checking if it has gone out of bounds.

    • Motorcycle

      public Motorcycle(int startX, int startY, String initialDirection, Color color, String name)
      Creates a new motorcycle with the given starting position, direction, color, and player name.
      Parameters:
      startX - the starting x-coordinate of the motorcycle
      startY - the starting y-coordinate of the motorcycle
      initialDirection - the initial direction of the motorcycle
      color - the color of the motorcycle
      name - the name of the player controlling the motorcycle

    • move

      public void move(int stepSize)
      Moves the motorcycle in its current direction by a given step size.
      Parameters:
      stepSize - the number of units to move

    • isOutOfBounds

      public boolean isOutOfBounds(int width, int height)
      Checks if the motorcycle is out of bounds on the game board.
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the game board
      height - the height of the game board
      Returns:
      true if the motorcycle is out of bounds, false otherwise
